message:
The Modpack UpdateTM

This update brings modpacks out of beta, adds filtering by category for installed mods, and includes various improvements and bug fixes.
changelog: Updated credits to include Ko-Fi supporters and lamedev
Added filtering by category for installed mods
Added unique user IDs to help with troubleshooting
Modpacks are now out of beta
Fixed modpack share code display issues
Added minor quality of life improvements
